caption.p: Rhinacanthus nasutus ( Rn) and its protective effects in pathways involved in neurodegenerative diseases. Rn inhibits tumor necrosis factor alpha (TNFα) release thus preventing its interaction with the TNFα receptor (TNFαR). Rn also prevents nuclear factor kappa-light-chain-enhancer of activated B cells (NF-κB) activation, which in turn leads a reduction in oxidative stress.
